item.title: Mentioned by Stockhouse
item.description:
Blaine Calkins, Member of Parliament for Wetaskiwin, Honours Veterans in Millet ...
MILLET, ALBERTA, June 22, 2013 /CNW/ - On behalf of the Honourable Steven Blaney, Minister of Veterans Affairs and Minister for La Francophonie, Blaine Calkins, Member of Parliament for Wetaskiwin, today joined members of Royal Canadian Legion Branch 229 and the Town of Millet in the unveiling of "Heroes Memorial Drive" in Millet, Alberta ... "I commend Royal Canadian Legion Branch 229 and the Town of Millet for acknowledging the local heroes who truly make a difference here in Millet," said MP Calkins.
